work.name: Technesthai
work.summary: As a Software Engineer Manager, I lead a team of developers and oversee IT activities. Focused on developing and maintaining the company's software solutions, I work closely with the CTO and other stakeholders to ensure the successful delivery of projects.
highlights: Actively involved in the development of the company's core product, working with technologies such as **Vue.js**, **Vuetify**, **.NET**,**PostgreSQL**, and **Docker**.
Responsible for managing the team's workload, defining priorities with CTO and stakeholders, and ensuring that projects are delivered on time given the available resources.
Involved in the recruitment process, including defining job descriptions, conducting interviews with CTO and HR, and onboarding new team members.
Collaborating with the CTO to **define company coding standards**, **best practices**, and **development processes**, ensuring that the team follows them.

work.name: IasonLtd
work.summary: As Financial Engineer and then Manager, I worked on Counterparty Credit Risk (CCR) and Market Data projects. I led teams, managed projects, and developed new features on client applications.
highlights: *Manager:* Led an eight-person IT team, overseeing budgeting, recruitment, and project deadlines. I executed the migration of a legacy ATS (Applicant Tracking System) application to **Vue.js** and **Vuetify**, enhancing its functionality and user experience. Additionally, I developed new features on both the **.NET** backend and **Vue.js** frontend to streamline HR processes, closely collaborating with the product manager to meet evolving business needs and improve overall efficiency.

*Senior Consultant:* Led two teams in Counterparty Credit Risk (CCR) and Market Data. I focused on SA-CCR and FRTB KPI GUI refactor, following the IT team as a functional analyst, providing guidance and support to the development team.

*Consultant:* Led a four-person team, overseeing project organization, defining priorities, and managing overall team projects. I implemented updates to the CCR application using **Java** to meet regulatory requirements and served as a functional analyst for SA-CCR.

*Junior Consultant:* Worked as a Financial Engineer, enhancing the CCR application, fixing bugs, and improving internal tools using **Java** as the primary language. I specialized in CCR exposure calculation.

projects.name: PodCats
projects.description: Developed a cat-themed podcast manager using Vue.js 3 and Vuetify 3 for the frontend, with a GoLang backend. The app features podcast playback, **multi-user support**, **RSS feed import**, **automatic feed updates** via cron jobs, and **universal search**. Tech stack includes Vue.js, howler.js, marked, gin-gonic, gorm, viper, and SQLite. Deployable with Docker.

projects.name: HomeLab
projects.description: I started my HomeLab by chance with a Raspberry Pi and the almighty [Pi-Hole](https://pi-hole.net/), and now I'm totally down the rabbit hole. It's addictive! I've since expanded to managing a [Proxmox](https://www.proxmox.com/en/) node, complete with a dedicated [pfSense](https://www.pfsense.org/) virtual machine serving as my home firewall. The complexity keeps growing, but so does the excitement!
